title: The Official Bob Ross Coloring Book: The Colors of the Four Seasons
description:
Featuring many of Ross's most famous quotes and catchphrases about happy little trees, friendly squirrels, and more, the book also includes a full-color gallery of the original artwork. But as he would no doubt want, coloring fans of all ages are encouraged to make their own decisions, embrace their mistakes, and make each painting their own.

Paperback, 96 pages.

Size: 11.11 in. x 0.38 in. x 8.15 in.
